Package sailpoint.workflow

Class IdentityRequestLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.workflow.IdentityRequestLibrary
  • public class IdentityRequestLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    A Collection of library method designed to handle the create, update and complete of an IdentityRequest object as it executes through a workflow.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  IdentityRequestLibrary.RequestItemizer
      Utility class to help derive RequestItems from the ProvisioningPlan(s) that are passed into the workflow.
      class  IdentityRequestLibrary.RequestResultAnnotator
      Class that goes through the plan results and applies them to the associated items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ARG_EXTERNAL_TICKET_ID
      Argument to hold the ticket created in the external ticketing system.
      static java.lang.String ARG_FLOW
      Argument to hold the flow that started the request.
      static java.lang.String ARG_IDENTITY_DISABLE_IDENTITY_REQUESTS
      Option that can be passed into each method or set at the workflow level to disable the identity request processing.
      static java.lang.String ARG_IDENTITY_DISPLAY_NAME
      Argument to hold the displayName for the user being targeted.
      static java.lang.String ARG_IDENTITY_NAME
      Argument to hold the identity name for the user being targeted.
      static java.lang.String ARG_IDENTITY_REQUEST
      Argument to hold the IdentityRequest object.
      static java.lang.String ARG_IDENTITY_REQUEST_ID
      Argument to hold the IdentityRequest id that should be updated.
      static java.lang.String ARG_PROJECT
      Argument to hold the compiled project.
      static java.lang.String ARG_SOURCE
      Argument to hold the source, this maps to the String version of sailpoint.object.Source.
      static java.lang.String ARG_SPLIT_PROVISIONING
      Argument to hold the status of a full Project or a Partial project derived from splitting the Master Project into Itemized Projects
      static java.lang.String ARG_STATE
      Argument to hold the "state" of the Identity request.
      static java.lang.String CONFIG_IDENTITY_REQUEST_ITEM_LIMIT
      System config option to speicfy the threshold for disabling the creation of IdentityRequestItems for large roles.
      static int DEFAULT_IDENTITY_REQUEST_ITEM_LIMIT
      The default identity request item limit.
      static java.lang.String STATE_APPROVE_AND_PROVISION_SPLIT
      Set as part of the Approve and Provision subprocess.
      static java.lang.String STATE_FINISHED
      End state, typically set as part of the Finish subprocess.
      static java.lang.String VAR_APPROVAL_SCHEME
      Argument to hold the approval scheme.
      static java.lang.String VAR_BATCH_ITEM_ID  
      static java.lang.String VAR_IDENTITY_REQUEST_ID
      Variable returned that hold the sequence id for the request.

      Update the IdentityRequestItems approvalState with the states of the given ApprovalSet.
      java.lang.Object completeIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc)
      Complete the IdentityRequest object, which includes: - Marking the status complete - Putting the finalPlan with the request - Refresh the request based on the final project

      Create an IdentityRequest given the current workflow context information.

      Update the identity request item provisioning states for manual work items.

    • Method Detail

      • createIdentityRequest

        public java.lang.Object createIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                       throws GeneralException
        Create an IdentityRequest given the current workflow context information. This is typically called as a side-effect of calling the "Initialize" subprocess. The create process goes through what is can to build up a model for the requested items.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • updateIdentityRequestState

        public java.lang.Object updateIdentityRequestState​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                            throws GeneralException
        Update the IdentityRequest object, either update it with the supplied ARG_STATE argument or it'll automatically resolve the "state" as the top level case name.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest object, if updated
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshIdentityRequestAfterApproval

        public java.lang.Object refreshIdentityRequestAfterApproval​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                                     throws GeneralException
        Adorn any built up ApprovalSummary objects back onto the request object. This gives the IdentityRequest model visibility into all of the interactions that took place during the request life cycle. Additionally refresh the request to include the ProvisioningEngine that will handle the item and add any expanded attributes that will be provisioned.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest object
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshIdentityRequestAfterProvisioning

        public java.lang.Object refreshIdentityRequestAfterProvisioning​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                                         throws GeneralException
        After provisioning copy interesting result information back to the IdentityRequest.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest object
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshIdentityRequestAfterRetry

        public java.lang.Object refreshIdentityRequestAfterRetry​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                                  throws GeneralException
        Go through the retry project and update the IdentityRequestItem retry count and execution state;
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest object
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • completeIdentityRequest

        public java.lang.Object completeIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                         throws GeneralException
        Complete the IdentityRequest object, which includes: - Marking the status complete - Putting the finalPlan with the request - Refresh the request based on the final project
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest object
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • recordBatchItemResult

        public void recordBatchItemResult​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                           throws GeneralException
        Update the BatchRequest and BatchRequestItems results. Make sure the stats update is thread safe.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • updateExternalTicketId

        public java.lang.Object updateExternalTicketId​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                        throws GeneralException
        Update the IdentityRequest.externalId when we have an external ticket it. This is only called by our Manage Ticket sub process. The method assumes there is one plan and that the connector has returned the object Id as part of the plan either in the Object request's nativeIdentity or as part of the provisioning result.
        Parameters:
        wfc -
        Returns:
        the ticket id returned by the connector otherwise null
        Throws:
        GeneralException
        Since:
        6.1

      • assimilateWorkItemApprovalSetToIdentityRequest

        public static java.lang.Object assimilateWorkItemApprovalSetToIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc,
                                                                              ApprovalSet set)
                                                                       throws GeneralException
        A static method that is called directly by some of the default approval step after scripts. Take an approval set and annotate the request with the decisions and the owner that made the decisions. This will also sync the IdentityRequest with the TaskResult WorkflowSummary
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • assimilateWorkItemApprovalSetToIdentityRequest

        public static java.lang.Object assimilateWorkItemApprovalSetToIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc,
                                                                              ApprovalSet set,
                                                                              boolean updateTaskResult)
                                                                       throws GeneralException
        Update the IdentityRequestItems approvalState with the states of the given ApprovalSet. Optionally Update the TaskResult with decisions made in a workItem. This will take the global ApprovalSet from the workflow variable and adorn the decisions to the TaskResult WorkflowSummary and update the interactions.
        Parameters:
        wfc - The WorkflowContext.
        set - ApprovalSet to update the IdentityRequest with
        updateTaskResult - True to update the TaskResult
        Returns:
        IdentityRequest
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • refreshWorkflowSummaries

        public static void refreshWorkflowSummaries​(IdentityRequest ir,
                                            TaskResult result)
                                     throws GeneralException
        Take the workflowSummary from the task result and persist them onto the Identity request. Sync up the summaries with the approval state on each item.
        Parameters:
        ir - IdentityRequest
        result - TaskResult
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • updateIdentityRequestItemProvisioningState

        public static void updateIdentityRequestItemProvisioningState​(ApprovalItem approvalItem,
                                                              WorkflowContext wfc)
                                                       throws GeneralException
        Update the identity request item provisioning states for manual work items. In this case we just set the state to committed.
        Parameters:
        approvalItem - ApprovalItem
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getIdentityRequest

        public static IdentityRequest getIdentityRequest​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                          throws GeneralException
        Get the IdentityRequest object preferably through the step arguments but also check the top level context.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • prepareApprovalSetForNotification

        public java.lang.Object prepareApprovalSetForNotification​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                                   throws GeneralException
        Prepare and return an ApprovalSet that can be used for notifications. This return a copy of the ApprovalSet in the WorkflowContext with the ApprovalItem displayValues decrypted. This is necessary for notifying users of generated passwords.
        Parameters:
        wfc - The WorkflowContext.
        Returns:
        A copy of the ApprovalSet in the WorkflowContext with all ApprovalItem displayValues decrypted, or null if there is no ApprovalSet in the WorkflowContext.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
